predicate.note: Frames file for 'wean' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

roleset.name: cause to be no longer dependent on

example.name: the one example
example.text: But Time, as part of the more cost-conscious Time Warner, wants [*-1] to wean itself away from expensive gimmicks.

roleset.note: Can also occur with arg2-off and arg2-of.
